Name: Slack - Send Simple Notification
Description: Send a basic message notification to Slack.

Parameters.Name: ssn_HookUrl
Parameters.Label: Hook URL
Parameters.HelpText: The Webhook URL provided by Slack, including token.

Parameters.Name: ssn_Channel
Parameters.Label: Channel handle
Parameters.HelpText: Which Slack channel to post notification to.

Parameters.Name: ssn_IconUrl
Parameters.Label: Icon URL
Parameters.HelpText: The icon shown in Slack against the notification.

Parameters.Name: ssn_Username
Parameters.Label: Username
Parameters.HelpText: The username shown in Slack against the notification.

Parameters.Name: ssn_Title
Parameters.Label: Title
Parameters.HelpText:
The title of the notification in Slack.

Supported formatting includes: ` ```pre``` `, `_italic_`, `*bold*`, and even `~strike~`.

Parameters.Name: ssn_Message
Parameters.Label: Message
Parameters.HelpText:
The body of the notification in Slack.

Supported formatting includes: ` ```pre``` `, `_italic_`, `*bold*`, and even `~strike~`.

Parameters.Name: ssn_Color
Parameters.Label: Color
Parameters.HelpText: Like traffic signals, color-coding messages can quickly communicate intent and help separate them from the flow of other messages in the timeline.
